title: Why are children prone to injury/death from landmines and ERW?
content:
-	Because these weapons are often colourful and shiny and are very attractive to young eyes that see them as potential toys.  
-	Children, particularly refugees and IDPs, returning home or forcibly displaced to new areas, are in particular danger of landmines because their family are most likely to be unaware of potential locations of mines, or because they are forced to travel through hazardous areas.
